docs.text: List of cargo types Raw Mineral Raw minerals are obtained by receiving and decomposing incoming asteroids. Deflecting asteroids reduces the production of these minerals. Amino acid DNA Rock Organic Organic cargo is used for inhabitant birth and survival. Ammunition Ammunition is ejected by defensive weapons to slow down or deflect asteroids. Pepples Container Other forms of resources can be packaged as container cargo. This allows inhabitants to carry small amount of all resources to poorly developed regions. Battery Gas bottle (Oxygen) Gas bottle (Carbon dioxide) Gas bottle (Nitrogen) Liquid bottle (Asteroidal water) Liquid bottle (Filtered water) Liquid bottle (Deionized water) Liquid bottle (Urine) Liquid bottle (Coolant) Intermediate Material Intermediate materials are derived from raw minerals or other intermediate materials to feed into other factories. They cannot be used in utility facilities. Junk Junk is the useless residue produced in other mechansims. They must be ejected out of the colony using junk launchers, otherwise they would fill up the space of the colony. Sediment
docs.title: List of cargo types

docs.text: List of mechanisms Population
docs.title: List of mechanisms

docs.text: Core The center of the whole colony The core is the ultimate building to protect. It provides basic resources, including a small amount of uninterrupted power, some oxygen generation and a few population housing. Destruction of the core ends the game.
docs.title: Core

docs.text: The center of the whole colony The core is the ultimate building to protect. It provides basic resources, including a small amount of uninterrupted power, some oxygen generation and a few population housing. Destruction of the core ends the game.
docs.title: Core

docs.text: House Produces and supports the survival of inhabitants.
docs.title: House

docs.text: Produces and supports the survival of inhabitants.
docs.title: House

docs.text: Solar panel Basic power production
docs.title: Solar panel

docs.text: Basic power production
docs.title: Solar panel

docs.text: Amino acid An organic mineral. Amino acids are found in small amounts in asteroids. Use them to synthesize food and DNA.
docs.title: Amino acid

docs.text: An organic mineral. Amino acids are found in small amounts in asteroids. Use them to synthesize food and DNA.
docs.title: Amino acid

docs.text: Battery Stores a small amount of power Charged in charging stations and discharged in discharging stations, batteries serve as an alternative method to transfer electricity between buildings. They are useful for avoiding construction of power cables into low-consumption regions and ensuring uninterrupted power supply in regions where cable often disconnects.
docs.title: Battery

docs.text: Stores a small amount of power Charged in charging stations and discharged in discharging stations, batteries serve as an alternative method to transfer electricity between buildings. They are useful for avoiding construction of power cables into low-consumption regions and ensuring uninterrupted power supply in regions where cable often disconnects.
docs.title: Battery

docs.text: DNA Genetic material. DNA is used to produce inhabitants through asexual reproduction. Although morally challenged, this is the most effective way to start a new colony from scratch.
docs.title: DNA

docs.text: Genetic material. DNA is used to produce inhabitants through asexual reproduction. Although morally challenged, this is the most effective way to start a new colony from scratch.
docs.title: DNA

docs.text: Gas bottle (Carbon dioxide) Stores a small amount of gas Produced in gas bottlers and centrifuges, gas bottles can be used to transfer a small amount of gas to factories as a replacement of diffusing gas slowly through corridors.
docs.title: Gas bottle (Carbon dioxide)

docs.text: Stores a small amount of gas Produced in gas bottlers and centrifuges, gas bottles can be used to transfer a small amount of gas to factories as a replacement of diffusing gas slowly through corridors.

docs.text: Liquid bottle (Asteroidal water) Stores a small amount of liquid Produced in liquid bottlers and centrifuges, liquid bottles can be used to transfer a small amount of liquid to factories as a replacement of constructing dedicated pipes through corridors.
docs.title: Liquid bottle (Asteroidal water)

docs.text: Pepples Stone pepples used as ammunition. Pepples are produced by decomposing rocks.They are the basic type of ammunition for defense.
docs.title: Pepples

docs.text: Stone pepples used as ammunition. Pepples are produced by decomposing rocks.They are the basic type of ammunition for defense.
docs.title: Pepples

docs.text: Rock Chunks of rocks from asteroids. Rocks are the cheapest type of material obtained from asteroids. They can be used as ammunition or disposed as junk.
docs.title: Rock

docs.text: Chunks of rocks from asteroids. Rocks are the cheapest type of material obtained from asteroids. They can be used as ammunition or disposed as junk.
docs.title: Rock

docs.text: Sediment Filtration and distillation residue. Sediments are waste produced during liquid processing. They cannot be used for anything, and should be ejected with junk launchers to avoid filling up storage space.
docs.title: Sediment

docs.text: Filtration and distillation residue. Sediments are waste produced during liquid processing. They cannot be used for anything, and should be ejected with junk launchers to avoid filling up storage space.
docs.title: Sediment

docs.text: Carbon dioxide Photosynthesis material Carbon dioxide is produced in houses and consumed in oxygen farms. While high carbon dioxide level is not necessarily fatal, they reduce the levels of other gases in the air.
docs.title: Carbon dioxide

docs.text: Photosynthesis material Carbon dioxide is produced in houses and consumed in oxygen farms. While high carbon dioxide level is not necessarily fatal, they reduce the levels of other gases in the air.
docs.title: Carbon dioxide

docs.text: Nitrogen An abundant, safe gas for pressure regulation Nitrogen is found in abundant amounts. Although chemically inactive, they are great for pressure regulation and can be condensed to produce coolants.
docs.title: Nitrogen

docs.text: An abundant, safe gas for pressure regulation Nitrogen is found in abundant amounts. Although chemically inactive, they are great for pressure regulation and can be condensed to produce coolants.
docs.title: Nitrogen

docs.text: Oxygen Needed for breathing Oxygen is required for survival of inhabitants. Inhabitants cannot work in buildings with low oxygen content, except for construction work, where sufficient oxygen must be available in adjacent buildings.
docs.title: Oxygen

docs.text: Needed for breathing Oxygen is required for survival of inhabitants. Inhabitants cannot work in buildings with low oxygen content, except for construction work, where sufficient oxygen must be available in adjacent buildings.
docs.title: Oxygen

docs.text: Asteroidal water Water found on asteroids Deposits of water can sometimes be found in asteroids. Contaminated by asteroidal minerals, it must be filtered to be used in factories, or deionized so that it is drinkable by inhabitants.
docs.title: Asteroidal water

docs.text: Water found on asteroids Deposits of water can sometimes be found in asteroids. Contaminated by asteroidal minerals, it must be filtered to be used in factories, or deionized so that it is drinkable by inhabitants.
docs.title: Asteroidal water

docs.text: Coolant A liquid at very low temperature Coolants are produced by condensation of nitrogen. They are required in factories with highly exothermic reactions.
docs.title: Coolant

docs.text: A liquid at very low temperature Coolants are produced by condensation of nitrogen. They are required in factories with highly exothermic reactions.
docs.title: Coolant

docs.text: Deionized water Drinking water Soluble impurities in water are removed from water during deionization. This makes the water safe for inhabitant intake.
docs.title: Deionized water

docs.text: Drinking water Soluble impurities in water are removed from water during deionization. This makes the water safe for inhabitant intake.
docs.title: Deionized water

docs.text: Filtered water Water without insoluble impurities. Filtered water is removed of insoluble impurities, so they can be used in other factories without clogging up the pipes.
docs.title: Filtered water

docs.text: Water without insoluble impurities. Filtered water is removed of insoluble impurities, so they can be used in other factories without clogging up the pipes.
docs.title: Filtered water

docs.text: Urine Waste produced by inhabitants Urines are organic waste produced by inhabitants in houses. Arrange sewage pipes to remove them from houses and recycle them by distillation into drinking water.
docs.title: Urine

docs.text: Waste produced by inhabitants Urines are organic waste produced by inhabitants in houses. Arrange sewage pipes to remove them from houses and recycle them by distillation into drinking water.
docs.title: Urine
